mapper.select: SELECT *, SUM(score_plus) as sum FROM(SELECT *, WEEK(score_date, 5) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(score_date, INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(score_date) - 1 DAY), 5) + 1 as week, month(score_date) as month FROM mn_score_history WHERE month(score_date) = #{month} and WEEK(score_date, 5) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(score_date, INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(score_date) - 1 DAY), 5) + 1=#{week}) as b INNER JOIN mn_member as a ON a.id = b.id GROUP BY a.id HAVING type = 1 ORDER BY sum desc, score_no asc
